column2: IDEA-203912: assertTrue and assertFalse with a negative expression can be simplified

column3: This is the code for IDEA-203912.
It marks the code, when using assertTrue or assertFalse with a negated expression. This assertion can be changed to the opposite method and without the negation.
Could you please rebase the pull request so that it doesn't contain these "Merge pull request" commits? Thanks!
